fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm admin node health rules load without errors
fields.request_details:
1. Sign in to the Django admin and open /admin/.
2. Verify the dashboard loads without a NameError and the Nodes â†’ Nodes row renders the health status badge.
3. Confirm the badge shows a red cross with the appropriate error message when the local node is missing, lacks a role, or all upstream nodes are stale, then restore the original data so the badge returns to the green 'All rules met.' state.
